content.prompt: The concerns about immigration at the time of Thatcherâ€™s interview were most strongly reinforced by which of the following economic developments?

choices.label: The increasing dependence of the world economy on the United States financial system in the postwar period
The admission of Britain into the European Economic Community in 1973
The increased burden of defense spending on Western European state budgets during the Cold War
The downturn resulting from the oil shock and declining industry in the 1970s

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
